title: Proposal to lower the emission, plan to discontinue the Totem Poles and lower the multiplier
body:
1.  Our planned proposal is to lower the emission from

1 > 0.9

2. The plan is to discontinue the use of Deposit fees on Totem Poles and to lower the multiplier for this type of pool (also lowering deposit fees to 0% to all Totem poles)

TOTEM 25X > 10X
WFTM 15X > 1X
WETH 12X > 1X
BOO 10X > 0.7X
USDC 10X > 0.7X
FUSDT 10X > 0.7X
TBOND 8X > 0.5X
GRIM 8X > 0.5X
SCREAM 5X > 0.25X

3. The other plan is to adjust the multiplier of our other farm/pool

TOTEM-FTM (Spiritswap) 60X > 50X
TOTEM-FTM (Spookyswap) 50X > 25X
TOTEM-USDC 5X > 15X
TOTEM-DAI 5X > 10X
TOTEM-FUSDT 5X > 10X
TOTEM-BNB 0X > 10X
SPIRIT-FTM 8X
FTM-USDC 6X
GRIM-FTM 5X
HODL-FTM 2.5X
BSCR-FTM 1X
author: 0x5D7cC4198a6B50A14A44972131a68e20a57D6072
